title: Refrigerator Dill Pickles
method: Step 2: Stir water, vinegar, sugar, and sea salt together in a saucepan over high heat; bring to a boil. Remove from the heat and cool completely.
Step 3: Combine cucumber spears, garlic cloves, and fresh dill in a large glass or plastic lidded container.
Step 4: Pour cooled vinegar mixture over cucumbers, garlic, and dill.
Step 5: Seal container with lid and refrigerate for at least 3 days.
